t: Amazon.com: Count Me In: CDs & Vinyl
s: Rebelution never ceases to amaze me. This album is absolutely wonderful and after reading others reviews, I don't see how anyone could rate this less than 5 stars. It is the ACOUSTIC album so expecting it to be like the original Count Me In album doesn't make sense. Hearing this album is equivalent to hearing brand ...

t: Rebelution - Courage to Grow - Amazon.com Music
s: at first noticed it would skip I’m assuming brand new vinyl and it’s grooves aren’t that clean (vinyl build up). I placed a quarter on my vinyl players needle to give it just enough weight to keep the needle from skipping without scratching. Hope this helps ... I have always been a fan of Reggae sounds and bands like Sublime and Pepper that add rock influence as well. I have used the Amazon sample system to find new bands and Rebelution ...

t: Amazon.com: Falling Into Place: CDs & Vinyl
s: Excellent addition to my ever-growing Rebelution collection. Although this cd is short - I truly like each and every song and can easily leave it on repeat for days. This is currently my favorite Rebelution CD to date and that song lyrics are all very catchy.

t: Amazon.com: Peace of Mind: CDs & Vinyl
s: This is one of Rebelution's best albums, hands down. I had heard that the pressing for bad for some. I am here to tell ya that they have fixed all the issues and this pressing sounds great! Do not hesitate to get it. It has a nice gatefold and TWO vinyls.

t: Rebelution - In The Moment - Amazon.com Music
s: In The Moment is Rebelution’s seventh studio album. Recorded remotely in the midst of the pandemic, the new album is deliberate and wide-ranging, infusing the quartet’s soulful, exhilarating brand of modern reggae with addictive pop hooks, alt-rock grit, and hip-hop grooves.
